name: Mining Out
description:
It's almost New Year's Eve, but you're still stuck in a cave alone, get out of there in 31 days and pick some gold and diamonds while you're at it!

- Each time you mine a tile you will get tired and move slower
- You can only mine downwards 4 times
- Don't worry, you can sleep to regain your stamina and your ability to mine downwards but It'll make a day pass.
- Gold is worth 1 point and Diamonds are worth 5.

- The cave is randomly generated each time you play 

- The exit of the cave is at the bottom, but don't rush there, it wouldn't be good to get out empty-handed
- Good luck!

Game made for the Weekly Game Jam 181, with the theme New Year's Eve.
